name: Racing in Traffic: Nice Car Sp
name_original: Racing in Traffic: Nice Car Sp
description:
Racing in Traffic: Nice Car Speed is the new free racing game from the creators of Car Driving Simulator. Drive full speed as a furious racer from a real cockpit!
Features:
- Realistic driving physics, suspension and driving assists like ABS.
- Extremely real cockpits with the best graphics ever seen in a racing mobile game.
- Detailed city
- Drive from outside with the exterior camera
- Automatic throttle mode
